head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden ¶ 5/10/65 ¶ SIr ¶ ¶ I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to grant one hundred copies of my new report ¶ for transmission to institutions, with which the botani...

div.p: L65/9393, unit 108, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to grant one hundred copies of my new report
B65.10.01. for transmission to institutions, with which the botanic Garden of Melbourne maintains interchanges, I beg further to recommend that of the plan accompanying the report & of the print explanatory of the same one thousand extra copies for sale may be provided at the Gov Printing Office before the lithographic drawing on the stone is destroyed.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
The honorable the Chief Secretary
Approval for M's request was minuted to this letter and referred to the Government Printer.
